# 11.6.13.5     Error 12-5 (emergency code 8100h)

Cause: CAN option: Illegal address

# Suggested steps:

- Please check the configuration of the CAN address (software and hardware settings). The parameter 2005[0] indicates the set CAN software address, The parameter 2058[0] indicates the set CAN address of the DIP switches.
- This issue is probably caused by an unsuitable parameter setting.
Q: What are the suggested steps to address Error 12-5 (emergency code 8100h) related to CAN option illegal address?
A1: Check the configuration of the CAN address in both software and hardware settings.
A2: Verify parameter 2005[0] for the CAN software address and parameter 2058[0] for the CAN address set by DIP switches.
A3: Ensure the parameter settings are suitable to resolve the illegal address issue.
A4: Inspect both software and hardware configurations for any discrepancies in CAN address settings.
A5: The issue likely stems from incorrect parameter settings; review and adjust as necessary.
